name: Frey
title: Priestess of Light

uniqueWeapon.name: God's Authority, Rosmerta

Every 8 sec, heals 4 allies with the lowest HP by 165% of own ATK, and increases Crit Chance by 300 and Crit DMG by 42% for the ally with the highest ATK for 8 sec.
Every 8 sec, heals 4 allies with the lowest HP by 200% of own ATK, and increases Crit Chance by 300 and Crit DMG by 50% for the ally with the highest ATK for 8 sec.

soulWeapon.advancement0: Summons the soul Oof God's Authority, Rosmarta for 12 sec. Healing HP of 1 ally with the lowest HP by ??? every sec. Additionally, attack the enemy with the highest ATK and enemies nearby it every 1 sec, dealing ??? M.DMG and inflicting stun for 1 sec.

soulWeapon.advancement2: Increases Heal Rate by 50%, and healed target block all incoming attacks for 5 sec.
soulWeapon.activation: Charges up upon using Skills 5 times.

dark: Increases ATK of all allies by 5% of own ATK.

background.story: An apprentice priestess serving the Goddess Lua, the church has high expectations of her as a future priestess. From the early years of her training, she has amazed even the high priests with her strong faith and natural talent for channeling Lua's power. She herself considers priesthood her destined path, and her kind heart reflects her resolve. However, she shows no mercy toward evildoers.

itemIntroductions.weapon: The Angels are said to be closer to Lua than any other race. When a high ranking angel dies, the remaining core is transferred to the haven of angels for resurrection. However, one such angel, Rosmerta, bestowed her core to the Church of Lua. This holy staff has been created from the core's divine energy.
itemIntroductions.soul:
Rosmerta, an angel who loved mankind so much, to the point where she would entrust them with her own core. Although her power was weaker than that of Lua, her will to protect the ones she love was as strong as that of Goddess Lua.
'Even if the goddess would abandon the humans, I will never stop protecting them. Even if that lead to the denial of my existence...'
As Frey's prayer accumulated, Rosmerta's will spread her wings and flew, as if it intended to break the silence.
The light resembled Lua yet different, but was as gentle and accommodating as the goddess.

As long as Frey prays for love, Rosmerta will always heed her calls and rain down her blessing upon Frey and the ones she loves.
treasures: The treasure that Frey loves dearly. It is a crystal orb that Frey had when she was found as an infant under the World Tree. Frey named it Angel's Egg for its luster like angel's hair, and she's cherished it her entire life.

Medal made by the saintess of miracles, Yvonne, with the revelation of the goddess. The Medal of Miracles is a sacred artifact that contains the magic of light. It is said that saintess Yvonne saved the city that was invaded by the demons with the blessing of light that was boosted with this medal.

Feather from the Guardian of the Sun. Feather of an Angel who saved the people by fighting against the Demons in the past. He left his feather as proof of his promise to return once again if the world falls into chaos. An artifact of the Church of Lua that summons holy rays of the sun to blind the enemy.

An old storybook owned by Frey. It was the first storybook ever given to young Frey as a present, and it tells of a war between the Angels and Demons. Frey particularly likes the part where the Angels emerge victorious after defeating all the Demons.
